name: Lumophore I
description:
→ Still taken from a full-dome playback work commissioned for the Kaluga Planetarium and Space Museum, Russia in  2013.

→ The work draws inspiration from a luminophore - a light-emitting atom or group of atoms. During the film, the audience becomes an integral part of the atomic space

→ Artwork by Paul Prudence @MrPrudence → Edition of 1 (+ 1 Artist's Proof)
